amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that the legislation does not allow for oil and gas drilling on the northern coast of California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 112-74 to clarify that the legislation does not allow for oil and gas drilling on the northern coast of California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 263 (Roll no. 317).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Thompson (CA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 263 (Roll no. 317).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
